data.title: Robert Lowery
data.meta_description: Robert Lowery (b. October 17, 1913 – d.December 26, 1971) portrayed Batman/Bruce Wayne in the movie serial Batman and Robin, succeeding Lewis Wilson in the role. He also portrayed Gary Allen in the episode "The Deadly Rock" of the series The Adventures of Superman. Pictured: Robert Lowery as...
data.text:
Robert Lowery (b. October 17, 1913 – d.December 26, 1971) portrayed Batman/Bruce Wayne in the movie serial Batman and Robin, succeeding Lewis Wilson in the role. He also portrayed Gary Allen in the episode "The Deadly Rock" of the series The Adventures of Superman.

Pictured: Robert Lowery as Batman/Bruce Wayne from Batman and Robin
